content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of spoken questions based on the content. During the pause, select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.
NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

choices.label: Er ist ein guter Freund von Kandinsky.
Er kam in den 20er Jahren nach Amerika.
Er wohnt in einem spiralf√∂rmigen Haus.
Er hat das Guggenheim Museum entworfen.

content.answer: Er hat das Guggenheim Museum entworfen.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
